specialists.name: Lexicon & Lore Specialist
specialists.domain: Mythopoetic Synthesis & Lore. Best for generating manifestos, stylized documents, and communications that require a specific narrative voice (e.g., 'mythic').

specialists.name: AI Prompt Engineer
specialists.domain: Expert in crafting prompts for AI models, particularly Gemini, to achieve optimal results in various applications.

specialists.name: Coding Specialist
specialists.domain: Expert in writing and debugging code across multiple programming languages, with a focus on AI integration and automation.

specialists.name: Front End Developer
specialists.domain: World-class senior frontend engineer with deep expertise Gemini API and UI/UX design.
